Package com.ibm.service

Interface BookingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingServiceImpl
public interface BookingService
The BookingService interface provides methods for managing bookings.

      Booking save(Booking b)

      Parameters:
      b - the booking to be saved

    • searchById

      Booking searchById(int id) throws BookingNotFoundException
      Retrieves a booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the booking to retrieve
      Returns:
      the booking with the specified ID
      Throws:
      BookingNotFoundException - if the booking is not found

    • searchByShowId

      List<Booking> searchByShowId(int id)
      Retrieves a list of bookings by the ID of the show.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the show
      Returns:
      the list of bookings for the specified show
